author: Simon Difford
description: A fruity, zesty, light summery cocktail. Tip - pouring the soda first makes this refreshingly juicy drink easier to mix due to the specific gravities of the ingredients.
name: Grand 'O'
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: POUR soda water into ice-filled glass to half fill
ADD lemon juice, orange juice and Grand Marnier

video.description: A fruity, zesty, light summery cocktail. Tip - pouring the soda first makes this refreshingly juicy drink easier to mix due to the specific gravities of the ingredients.
video.name: HOWTO make Grand 'O'
